https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ig1zlGQ0PXWj4m01G37WXQ6OxFI.jpg The movie is about Srikanth, a low class youth who goes to Ooty for a job and comes across Aarthy Agarwal. He falls in love with her. However her parents arrange for her wedding with Vikram Adhithya, who happens to be a slimy cookie Bambara Kannaley
